translation: Fools disregard Me, clad in human form, not knowing My higher Being as the great Lord of all beings.
commentary: 9.11 disregard disregard? Maam Me? Fools fools? Human human? tanum form? dependent assumed? But higher? Bhavam state or nature? Ajanantah not knowing? My My? Bhutamaheswaram the Great Lord of beings.Commentary Fools only find fault with My pure nature? just as a man with jaundiced eyes finds all objects to be yellow. The man who is suffering from fever finds even milk as bitter as the essence of neem.
